Title: Ugetsu
Writer: Matsutarô Kawaguchi (adaptation), Hisakazu Tsuji (idea), Akinari Ueda (stories), Yoshikata Yoda (screenplay)
Actors: Machiko Kyô, Mitsuko Mito, Kinuyo Tanaka, Masayuki Mori
Plot: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 1 nomination.
